website_summaries.verdict: Whether you loved the classic comics or need a super-sturdy figure for a roughhousing child, this bendy Wonder Woman toy is a great buy for fans of all ages.
pros: Her Justice League friends Batman and Green Lantern are also available

customer_reviews.title: 3.5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 3 year old daughter, who is a huge Wonder Woman fan. Wonder Woman toys are hard to find so I was excited to find this action figure that wasn't outrageously overpriced. This bendable action figure wasn't as bendable as I expected it to be and in fact is pretty limited. That is the reason that I didn't give this toy 5 stars. It's better than ok but it's not as great as I had hoped it would be.

customer_reviews.title: Creepy doll
customer_reviews.text: This doll is super creepy looking. I couldn't find any other affordable FEMALE superheroes for my daughter. I hope she likes it, because it just scares me.
customer_reviews.author: MisLissaR

customer_reviews.title: Yea Wonder Woman
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is loving Wonder Woman, her bedroom has been changed into a super heroes display. Walls, books, and toys. For myself I was delighted to find a wonder woman with a skirt instead of briefs. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: bbsure

customer_reviews.title: Wonder WOOO-MAN!!
customer_reviews.text: Great little figure, nice detail and she stands on her own. I really like these, they harken back to the days of the old Mego bendy's, so if you're feeling a bit nostalgic or just want a neat little item for you desk you can't go wrong here.
customer_reviews.author: IMHO Tep

customer_reviews.title: Cheeserific
customer_reviews.text: I thought it looked cheesy but the figure in the dollar store packaging is beyond cheesy oh well its for a six yr old for her bday but I do feel ripped off its a 3$ toy not almost 8$ toy
customer_reviews.author: carly humphrey

customer_reviews.title: No lasso but still great.
customer_reviews.text: She's all you could ask for although a little top heavy. Those were the 60s!
customer_reviews.author: David Foss

customer_reviews.title: great investment!
customer_reviews.text: I am a grown woman and I really don't play with dolls any more but I gave these out at a woman in technology event as a symbol of female empowerment...it made the ladies smile, think and reflect...great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Bass

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again, get what you pay for no harmful pieces for children
customer_reviews.text: Paint scratched off within 2 hours, she loves the toy but cheap quality. No choking parts which is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: About 6 inches tall it bends at the arms and a bit at the neck
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my daughter wanted to play with the boys- great toy!
customer_reviews.author: GNS3

customer_reviews.title: 5 is into super heroes so I figured he needed a woman for ...
customer_reviews.text: MY GRANDSON, 5 is into super heroes so I figured he needed a woman for his collection. He loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Skipper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for a side gift, she's small but thats okay!
customer_reviews.author: Della Holstrom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect - used it as a cake topper for my granddaughter's birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Classic Comic Book TV Series Wonder Woman!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice...Thank you, again! This was a Christmas gift & very excited child!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Way smaller than expected, will have to find one somewhere else
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Turner

customer_reviews.title: Wonder-ful, and super fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of my wife's Mother's Day gifts, and she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: WW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Wonder Woman and adores her new toy.
customer_reviews.author: tabatha.love

customer_reviews.title: stand up
customer_reviews.text: it cant stand up, the artist did a good job with painting particularly the face, they should avail the toy with a stand
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTOPHER L.

customer_reviews.title: Wonder of Figurines
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a motivator and assume the Wonder Woman position when I need to be empowered.
customer_reviews.author: sbbmd

customer_reviews.title: Expected a normal action figure like my sons
customer_reviews.text: Expected a normal action figure like my sons. My little girl asked why don't the arms move like my brothers toys?
customer_reviews.author: Art

product_meta.title: NJ Croce Wonder Woman New Frontier Action Figure
product_meta.description: Wonder Woman, an Amazonian warrior princess, is a symbol of strength for women everywhere. Beautiful and talented, her martial arts training and superhuman abilities make her a powerful force to be reckoned with This product is manufactured in China.
